data.name: Billy Saves the World
data.detailed_description:
Play as Billy: A boy with a broken heart who’s mysteriously transported to a distant planet that’s littered with levels to complete, alien inhabitants to meet, and baddies to beat! It’s a cinematic platformer with the spirit of a classic adventure game where you’ll learn to become the better half, for your other half.

Oh, and you’ll uncover an ancient Prophecy and save the world, too.



Run, Slide, Jump, Stomp, Rocket Boost, Wall-Hop, and use Jedi-like super powers through this narrative driven adventure that’s stuffed with player choices, optional side-quests, and puzzles -- all with multiple outcomes and solutions depending on what you say and do. It’s Rayman x Telltale.

  • Explore and uncover an open world over five story chapters, spread across 7+ diverse hub areas: From the low-gravity of the Cosmos, to the slippery slopes of Aquaris and beyond -- each testing you in distinct ways during your adventure.
  • Packed with 30+ levels to discover, each with multiple routes, unique enemies, deadly traps, creative puzzles, secret collectibles, and nail biting time trials.
  • Optional upgrades including 6 additional Heart Pieces (all with unique benefits beyond health), and 7 special abilities that help you explore more of the world. Want to complete the game with the basic move set and minimal Heart Pieces? The choice is yours to make.
  • Billy Saves the World is a dream to stream. With so much player choice and a branching narrative, let your audience choose your adventure. Or try to beat your last speed-run by utilizing our thoughtfully designed world filled with hidden shortcuts and secrets.
  • Loot enemies, chests, and camps for mysterious items & ingredients that you can mix and match to create useful (and useless) concoctions. What will you make? Only one way to find out… down the hatch!
  • Featuring beautiful hand drawn environments and animations from top film & television professionals. Sound by Jonathan Beres (Game of Thrones) and a masterfully composed soundtrack from John McMillan (Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag, FarCry 3) and multiplatinum music producer Tom Ratesic. Written, Directed, and Designed by Cooper Bibaud — an award winning film producer and screenwriter behind Bullet Proof, HEEL KICK!, and Love/Hate.

data.short_description: Run, Power-Slide, Rocket Boost and more, through this scifi-vania platformer! Or, explore, solve puzzles, and help wacky aliens to progress through our comedic love story about becoming a better half, for your other half. Oh... and save the world, too.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
